description:
(Found in Collection 2/27/96)
main body from one piece of leather with tongue and cuff added; seam from tip of toe to tongue; inverted 't' seam at heal; leather gathered around tongue; flower decorations of seed bead on tongue and cuff
medium: Leather, seed bead, velveteen, denim, paper, cotton, satin weave silk ribbon
title: Moccasins
